          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A COBE</string>
            <string language="en-US">The COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το COBE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El COBE</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A COBE mérései a korai Univerzum sűrűségeloszlását térképezték fel</string>
            <string language="en-US">The measurements of the COBE mapped the density distribution of the early Universe</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">A COBE</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Messen des COBE bildeten die Dichteverteilung
des frühen Universums ab</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les mesures du COBE ont tracé la distribution de 
densité du premier univers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As medidas do COBE traçaram a distribuição da 
densidade do universo adiantado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le misure del COBE hanno tracciato la 
distribuzione di densità dell'universo in anticipo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μετρήσεις του COBE χαρτογράφησαν τη διανομή 
πυκνότητας του πρόωρου κόσμου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las medidas del COBE asociaron la distribución de
la densidad del universo temprano</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
